entry.title: Keyfit - KHW001 - Keyfit Head Wrench
entry.summary:
Vendor: Keyfit
Type: Sprinkler Tools
Price: 79.98

The Head Wrench made by Keyfit is a specialty tool for irrigation professionals. The Head Wrench perfectly fits all brands of spray heads, all rotor heads and Jar-Top valves up to 4 in diameter. The Head Wrench is drop forged, precision machined and made in the USA.

  • The Head Wrench has inner teeth that are directional making it grip better with less pressure and less jaw slip!
  • The 45 degree angled jaw makes for easy access to sprinkler bodies.The Head Wrench is also drop forged and precision CNC machined in the USA. Its a very high quality specialty tool.
  • The Head Wrench has jaws that are designed exactly for all spray and rotor heads up to 4 in diameter and with jar top style valves.
  • The Head Wrench has bottom drop down teeth that fit perfectly into the cap fins making it easy to just replace the guts or remove the entire sprinkler head with little or no digging.
  • The Head Wrench has outer easy-out teeth that are CNC machined into the outside of the jaw for extracting broken fittings and sprinkler bodies. You can simply insert the Head Wrench inside the sprinkler body and extract without even digging around the head.
  • The LOCK-UP SYSTEM holds the jaws of the wrench tight, freeing up your hands to work. Simply latch the Up-Lock band around both handles and let the Keyfit wrench do the hard work for you!

entry.title: Rain Bird - PTC-1 - Spray Head Pull-Up Tool
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rain Bird
Type: Sprinkler Tools
Price: 11.95

Ever noticed how difficult it is to change or install nozzles? This easy to use tool allows you to pull the stem upwards and keep it from retracting. Once the spray head is installed in your system you can easily replace or install nozzles by using the Pull Up Tool.

  • Use for repairing and installing plastic pop-up sprinklers.
  • Flat tipped handle used to lift case cap and to unscrew cap to cases female threaded vertical and horizontal inlet.
  • Removes sprinkler head from base for cleaning or replacement.
  • Corrosion-resistant

entry.title: Rain Bird - 42064 - Wrench for Maxi-Paw Rotors
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rain Bird
Type: Sprinkler Tools
Price: 7.95

Used for routine maintenance of Rain Bird pop-up impact sprinkler models LG-3 Mini-Paw, AG-5 and 2045A Maxi-Paw, this tool makes quick work of servicing the sprinklers internal assembly. No need to dig or remove the entire sprinkler head. Use the top of the wrench to pry up the top of the sprinkler. Then unscrew the sprinklers internal mechanism using the extended hex portion of the wrench. Clean or replace the mechanism using the reverse procedure. This handy wrench will help you keep your irrigation system working efficiently for a lush, green lawn with uniform watering and minimal overspray.

Features & Benefits

  • Easily clean or replace Rain Bird impact sprinkler head internal assemblies without digging
  • Chrome finished tool is designed for use with LG-3/Mini-Paw, AG-5/Maxi-Paw and 2045A Maxi-Paw sprinklers
  • Lift the cap using the flat tipped handle
  • Unscrew and lift the sprinkler mechanism using the lower hex wrench

entry.summary:
Vendor: Seymour
Type: Sprinkler Tools
Price: 4.45

Description

A heavy-duty industrial marker available in water and solvent-based formulations. The no-clog, fast-drying formula is available in a full range of construction and APWA colors. The Seymour Converta-Cap has a specially-designed protective cover that does not need to be removed before using. This provides the user with a convenient marking tool without the worry of accidentally spraying.

Features

  • A heavy-duty industrial marker available in water and solvent-based formulations
  • fast-drying formula is available in a full range of construction and APWA colors
  • The no-clog

entry.title: King Innovation - 2'' Replacement Blade for Ratchet Poly/PVC Pipe Cutter - 46351
entry.summary:
Vendor: King Innovation
Type: Sprinkler Tools
Price: 12.52

King Innovation replacement pipe cutter blades

King Innovation replacement pipe cutter blades fit the King Innovation 46350 Pipe Cutters. No need to buy a new tool should the old blade wear out.

King Innovation ratcheting pipe cutters make PVC pipe repairs and installations a snap. No sawing or deburring required; simply cut the desired pipe length with these durable, easy to use pipe cutters.The King Innovation Ratcheting Pipe Cutters feature a pointed heat-treated steel blade for precision cuts and a durable cast aluminum body for reliable, long-lasting performance.

  • Heat treated steel blade
  • Replacement blade for 46350
  • Use only to cut plastics or rubber
  • Not intended to cut metal
